author: Duncan Ball
text: Rail tickets sorted for Blackpool £149:80 return happy with that however return is basically by coach from Manchester to Poole 🙄if I wanted to travel by coach then I would do wouldn't I 🤬

author: Duncan Ball
text: Now I know I said no more clothes for now but however when you just happen across a new site with the most gorgeous suede trucker type jacket you just know you have to buy it 👌

author: Duncan Ball
text: Hmmmm looking at maybe buying some soul 45,s nothing expensive just quality tunes and Barbara Acklin is always welcome in my pad 🕺

author: Duncan Ball
text: Congratulations Forest Green Rovers FC back from where I'm from Promotion 👍

author: Duncan Ball
text: Liking the look of the handlebar mounted rev counter from MB for my Italian mistress 👍

author: Duncan Ball
text: 60,s British R&B royalty All together https://t.co/lIM3VkwSQx

author: Duncan Ball
text: What a tune what a voice Hammond organ groove and Julie Driscoll basically the most beautiful woman in music ❤️https://t.co/SCxxgqykCT

author: Duncan Ball
text: When you see a job advertised where you work another 5 grand over what you are paid and they need to be able to do the job you have been doing for 5 years already hmmm I'm like hang on a fecking minute

author: Duncan Ball
text: Rethink save money hit 14 stone hit Saville Row for a suit sorted 👍set goals in life and achieve them and watch the smile on your face beam

author: Duncan Ball
text: So let's get this straight one night stay in London in Wardour Street cheapest I could find is more expensive than 3 nights in a hotel in Blackpool 🤔how much 😳

author: Duncan Ball
text: Tick list to finish buying parts to finally finish My Lambretta GP250LC Italian 90mph speedo voltmeter and DC Pitsch rev counter one week end in the garage and the Taffspeed 34bhp motor will be howling around Dorset woohoo

author: Duncan Ball
text: Well what a turn around last August 19 stone 3 pounds and now? 15 stone 12 pounds get in whoop whoop happy happy definitely looking forward to well deserved pint or two of Guinness's next weekend and a T bone steak the size of a dust bin lid 👌

author: Duncan Ball
text: Now do I take the risk of cooking a t bone steak on a hot stone myself when in Blackpool or chicken out🤔

author: Duncan Ball
text: Off to Italy next year Monte Cassino battlefield tour will be booked next week for next year 4 years after first talking to Leger cannot wait lasagne and Peroni will be consumed 🤗

author: Duncan Ball
text: Got my mojo working https://t.co/KACHDmCoWQ

author: Duncan Ball
text: At last something good to watch on the box https://t.co/2skUJzb23M

author: Duncan Ball
text: Maybe a touch of seersucker ❤️hurry up pay day I need to feed my clothes obsession

author: Duncan Ball
text: How much I wish Twatter had a block button for anyone or anything to do with politics 🙄

author: Duncan Ball
text: At last something decent to watch on TV https://t.co/FfCI2GlGyZ

author: Duncan Ball
text: Has anyone bought real Hoxton shirts? If so what are the sizes like? Very darted? Etc cheers

author: Duncan Ball
text: When people post about politics 😁 https://t.co/fzPuR3ldFq

author: Duncan Ball
text: Off to John Simons end of May clothes shopping up there in London Town shirts aplenty and hopefully a rather lovely 3 button natural shoulder jacket in a check with centre vent ❤️thank god for overtime

author: Duncan Ball
text: Up early shower shave banana sorted for breakfast now on a part bench listening to rare soul looking at the sea the sun peaking through the early morning haze thinking life is bloody amazing enjoy it peeps ❤️

author: Duncan Ball
text: At 6,2 6,3 16 stone healthy and happy apparently I'm malnourished according to Twatter experts 🙄

author: Duncan Ball
text: So apparently according to Twatter experts my meal yesterday of a big bowl of Granola with honey nuts raisins blueberries Greek yogurt then a banana at dinner time and large tin of baked beans 4 pieces of wholemeal toast for tea isn't enough well it is for me 🙄Anyway Bond is on

author: Duncan Ball
text: Mute mute mute only really interested in music clothes Lambrettas positivity custard doughnuts Raquel Welch holidays having a laugh and genuinely being a jolly nice fellow ❤️

author: Duncan Ball
text: Been dancing around my pad for the last 2 weeks to sweet soul music breaking in my new brogues ready for Blackpool Northern Soul weekender ❤️never danced in brogues before more of a loafer man this could go very wrong 😂

author: Duncan Ball
text: One of the benefits of losing 3 stone is CLOTHES SHOPPING 😁knitwear in gorgeous chalk blue real Hoxton shirts in stripes mad checks Madras I think I need a bigger wardrobe

author: Duncan Ball
text: Well after totting up how much my meals yesterday cost which was bowl of granola Greek yogurt blueberries banana and then beans on wholemeal toast in the evening whole cost about £1,20 I should be a millionaire if it wasn't for clothes music and Lambrettas oh well I'm happy 😁

author: Duncan Ball
text: Some people must tweet just to cause drama put something about a controversial subject sit back and watch people literally tear each other apart online is that what society wants? You are welcome to it I'll concentrate on happiness oh look custard doughnuts see🤗

author: Duncan Ball
text: Blackpool northern soul weekender booked for June loving life again now when's Whitby 😁

author: Duncan Ball
text: Tomahawk steak in Blackpool? Oh the temptation 😋

text: Nice relaxing hot towel cut throat razor shave at a Turkish barbers in Blackpool all booked for the end of the month then more dancing to sweet soul music cannot wait

text: Shirt maker sorted and only around the corner too 👍

author: Duncan Ball
text: To say I'm buzzing is a understatement amazing chat with a local ish lady tailor bang up for being my tailor and heads up where to go for warehouse clearance suit material local to me so cloth hunting I do go 👌

author: Duncan Ball
text: Walking around my pad breaking in my new brogues ready for Blackpool Northern Soul weekender I'm not coming home crippled cannot wait to have a boogie 😍

author: Duncan Ball
text: Come to the conclusion that if you come from say a modernist scooter rally northern soul etc background you never quite fit in with the norm thank feck for that 🙏

author: Duncan Ball
text: After reading the excellent book scorcha I've decided I was definitely born in the wrong era

author: Duncan Ball
text: Is twatter just for depressing people? Feck off so much positive news going on enjoy life not this shit
